title: Perception

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may choose a player. Learn what ability they performed tonight and on who.
- At night, you may instead copy an ability you've learned before, choosing new targets and gaining any necessary attributes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, you learn of every visitor of your target. You may choose one to kill and clean before the night ends.
- You can hear whispers.
Kill Note Addition:
*"I'm always watching."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4921
*See, hear and smell everything. Let no detail go unnoticed.*
